scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=test && export NODE_PATH=. && node src/app
scripts.test: export NODE_PATH=. && export NODE_ENV=test && mocha -R spec --recursive
scripts.coverage: export NODE_PATH=. && export NODE_ENV=test && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec --recursive
